Artikel Project CV

Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari

Undergraduate Student at Universitas Amikom Yogyakarta, Indonesia

I'm an Undergraduate Student in Informatics at Universitas Amikom Yogyakarta, Indonesia. I currently collaborating with Prof. Derry Wijaya of Monash University Indonesia, Dr. Kumara Ari Yuana, and Dr. (Cand.) Arif Dwi Laksito from Universitas Amikom Yogyakarta. On building dataset maker tools through document extraction named RagamBahasa.

Previously, I worked with Prof. Kusrini and Dr. Arief Setyanto on a project described as "Integrated Technological and Information Platform for Wildfire Management," which involved developing web-based analysis tools for forest fire monitoring by fusing geospatial data. Before that, I worked as a data engineer for a big data solution company in Yogyakarta, Indonesia, where I handled data flows from upstream to downstream. My research interest lie in Data Engineering, Software Engineering, Data Discovery, Information Extraction.

Current Activities

  • Undergraduate Researcher. Building platforms for Collecting and Digitizing Indonesian Local Language Resources.
    — International Research Collaboration in Data-NLP, funded by The MoECRT of Indonesia and LPDP 2022.

Publications

  • GIS data support technique for forest fire management and decision support system: A Sebangau National Park, Kalimantan case
    Kumara Ari Yuana, Kusrini Kusrini, Arief Setyanto, Arif Dwi Laksito, Zauvik Rizaldi Maruf, Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari, et al.
    IEEE 6th International Conference on Information and Communications Technology (ICOIACT), 2023
  • Machine Learning and Social Media Harvesting for Wildfire Prevention
    Arif Dwi Laksito, Kusrini Kusrini, Arief Setyanto, Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari, et al.
    IEEE 13th International Conference on Pattern Recognition Systems (ICPRS), 2023
  • Monte Carlo Method For Map Area Calculation In Wildland Fire Map Management
    Kumara Ari Yuana, Kusrini Kusrini, Arief Setyanto, Arif Dwi Laksito, Zauvik Rizaldi Maruf, Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari, et al.
    IEEE 6th International Conference on Information Technology, Information Systems and Electrical Engineering (ICITISEE), 2022
  • The Hybrid Recommender System of the Indonesian Online Market Products using IMDb weight rating and TF-IDF
    Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari, Arif Dwi Laksito
    Journal of Rekayasa Sistem dan Teknologi Informasi (RESTI), 2021

Course Taken
